data.title: Piamenta
data.meta_description: Orthodox Jew Yossi Piamenta's eponymous jam band performs.
data.text:
Profile

Thanks to his clumpy gray beard and ever-present skull-cap, Yossi Piamenta has been dubbed (albeit somewhat facetiously) the Hasidic Hendrix. But with funky jams that fuse Jewish sounds with the sixties rock he was weaned on, it may be more appropriate to label him the Israeli-born Trey Anastasio. Now a resident of Canarsie, Brooklyn, Piamenta has recorded with Stan Getz and performs with a jam band that includes his flautist brother, Avi.
